title: Attach files Bug in typophile forums. Any idea?
content:
Hello Guys,

I got surprised with the message above when I try to upload some images in my forums

**“File copy failed: no directory configured, or it could not be accessed”**

It’s not the first file that I attach… I post and delete some ones since I’ve created the topic… but today it’s just don’t work for me and now I’m restricted to post images here in Typophile!

Any idea what is happening? Could you help me? What should I do?

tks

e.
